verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"It is reported commonly that there is fornication among you, and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles, that one should have his father's wife.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-2/" title="1 Corinthians 5:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"And ye are puffed up, and have not rather mourned, that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you.
3 "JESUS_END"For I verily, as absent in body, but present in spirit, have judged already, as though I were present, concerning him that hath so done this deed,

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-4/" title="1 Corinthians 5:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, when ye are gathered together, and my spirit, with the power of our Lord Jesus Christ,

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-5/" title="1 Corinthians 5:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.
6 "JESUS_END"Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-7/" title="1 Corinthians 5:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:
8 "JESUS_END"Therefore let us keep the feast, not with old leaven, neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-9/" title="1 Corinthians 5:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-10/" title="1 Corinthians 5:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"Yet not altogether with the fornicators of this world, or with the covetous, or extortioners, or with idolaters; for then must ye needs go out of the world.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-11/" title="1 Corinthians 5:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"But now I have written unto you not to keep company, if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator, or covetous, or an idolater, or a railer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner; with such an one no not to eat.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-12/" title="1 Corinthians 5:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"For what have I to do to judge them also that are without? do not ye judge them that are within?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-5-13/" title="1 Corinthians 5:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"But them that are without God judgeth. Therefore put away from among yourselves that wicked person.
